view.title: Customer enters waitlist/queue flow
view.subtitle: Customer joined waitlist and entry is visible to both customer and operator APIs.

blocks.title: Customer Join Waitlist Flow completed
blocks.message: Customer joined waitlist and entry is visible to both customer and operator APIs.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

resultPayload.note: Customer joined waitlist and entry is visible to both customer and operator APIs.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

requestBody.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

requestBody.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs API Trace

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

resultPayload.note: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.

resultPayload.note: Revenue sanity computed from booking orders.
